mapper.insert: insert into credits (credits_id, Acquisition_type, Acquisition_time, plus_or_minus, quantity) values (#{creditsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acquisitionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acquisitionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{plusOrMinus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select credits_id, Acquisition_type, Acquisition_time, plus_or_minus, quantity from credits
